name: Get Big: Fish Battle
description:
"Get Big: Fish Battle" is a simple, addictive and challenging game!

To succeed in this battle you must grow your fish so that it can defend itself against the other fish. The rules are simple - Eat or be Eaten! Attack and eat other fishes to grow bigger.

Big fish always eat small fish! Keep feeding, eat smaller fish than you! Get bigger with every bite! Fight for your life and avoid larger fish, be a hunter not a prey. Be patient while growing up and you can take down the biggest fish! In the end you will be the biggest fish in the ocean!

How to play:
By tapping on the arrows you can move the hero. You should avoid big fish and eat smaller fish than you. Your size will change with every bite. The more you eat, the more you grow. In the end, you will be the biggest fish. Enjoy "Get Big: Fish Battle"!
